title.bibl: Lietuva, Aug. 6, 1909. Dagis, Lithuanian Monthly, to Be Published in Chicago

div.bibl: Lietuva, Aug. 6, 1909. DAGIS, LITHUANIAN MONTHLY, TO BE PUBLISHED IN CHICAGO

body.p: The Dagis (Thistle), monthly magazine of humor and satire, several numbers of which have been published in Boston, Mass., has changed ownership and, beginning with the next issue it will be published in Chicago, Ill., at 812 W. 33rd Street. The policy of the magazine will not be changed. However, the contents and technique of the magazine will be greatly improved. It will have a new editor and manager.
